titleStmt.title: My dearly beloved Friends and brethren whom the Lord hath reached unto, and visited with his heavenly power, by which you have been gathered to himself to eat of the finest of the wheat.
titleStmt.author: Hubbersty, Stephen, 1632?-1711.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Stephen Hubbersty ; Middlesex, the 20 of the 9th month, 1670.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
